name: Your Bish Therapist- Melissa Reich, MA

episodes.title: The Cult of the Real Housewives and Viall Files with Caitlin Marshall @bestiesbycaitlin
episodes.description: Caitlin shares her experience with the Tik Tok awards and being featured in the new Mary Cosby Doc. Caitlin discussed the controversy when she and other content creators were involved without knowledge and consent. Melissa and Caitlin discuss Austen Kroll’s recent interview on the Viall Files that went viral for all the wrong reasons. Melissa discusses the importance of focus on mental health over entertainment. TW: Discussion of sibling loss (sending LOVE to the entire sibling loss community) We hope you enjoy the episode. THANK YOU FOR LISTENING and for all the support! Please follow YBT podcast and give a 5-star comment & rating (it really helps!) episodes.title: Darling, Bish Hour: The Cult of the Real Housewife
episodes.description: Happy New Year! In the first Darling, Bish Hour of 2026 Melissa and Amy delve into the documentary about Mary Cosby, exploring the manipulative tactics used by cults, within Mary’s church, the generational trauma that influences her behavior, and the psychological profile of a would-be cult leader. Newly revealed audio is released, revealing new dimensions to Mary & Robert Cosby and Faith Temple Pentecostal Church. Melissa and Amy discuss the impact of the Enoch family and Cameron Williams’ story, the financial exploitation within cults, and the isolation tactics used by leaders to maintain control. The conversation raises important questions about accountability and the future of Mary Cosby on reality TV, emphasizing the need for individuals to listen to themselves and seek freedom from manipulative environments. We hope you enjoy the episode. THANK YOU FOR LISTENING and for all the support! Please follow YBT podcast and give a 5-star rating (it really helps!) episodes.title: Twin Flames Universe: Cult or Spiritual Refuge?
episodes.description: Trigger warning: This episode contains discussion of cults, abuse (religious/spiritual, emotional, verbal and sexual), coercion around sexual orientation and gender identity/expression, discussion of gender dysphoria and trauma. This episode features direct quotes from victims and perpetrators; Listener discretion is advised. In this supersized season finale episode, YBT dives deep into the world of Twin Flames leaders Jeff and Shaleia Ayan. Information shared in the podcast was compiled from two documentaries, a podcast and several news articles. YBT synthesized all this content to bring you a full picture of the Twin Flames Universe. YBT discusses different types of cults, warning signs about whether a group is a cult and provides an extensive explanation of how and why people get sucked into cults. YBT shares FACTS based on research studies, science and psychology. Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information. Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/your-bish-therapist--6065109/support .
